commonErrors: Text too long for selected error correction level

faq.question: What's the maximum text length for QR codes?
faq.answer: It depends on the data type and error correction level. URLs can typically be up to 2,000 characters, while plain text can be longer.

faq.question: What error correction level should I use?
faq.answer: Use L (7%) for clean environments, M (15%) for general use, Q (25%) for outdoor use, and H (30%) for damaged or dirty surfaces.

faq.question: Can I customize the QR code appearance?
faq.answer: Yes, you can adjust size, add colors, and include logos while maintaining scannability.

tools.seoTitle: Free QR Code Generator - Create QR Codes for URLs, WiFi, Contacts
tools.seoDescription: Generate custom QR codes for websites, WiFi, contacts, and more. Free online QR code generator with customizable options.

examples.description: Most common UUID type with random values

examples.title: UUID v1 (Timestamp)

commonErrors: Using predictable patterns instead of UUIDs
Not storing UUIDs in proper database format
Confusing UUID versions and their use cases

faq.question: What's the difference between UUID versions?
faq.answer: v1 uses timestamp+MAC, v4 is random, v5 uses SHA-1 hash. v4 is most common for general use.

faq.question: Are UUIDs guaranteed to be unique?
faq.answer: While extremely unlikely to collide, UUIDs are not 100% guaranteed unique. The probability is negligibly small for practical purposes.

tools.seoTitle: Free UUID/GUID Generator - Generate Unique Identifiers Online
